code: import{applyMiddleware,compose,createStore}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./root-reducer";var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var generateStore=function generateStore(){var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));return store;};export default generateStore;
